run.summary: Completed Phase 5-6 of reef native infrastructure; added Phase 7 worktree harness spec

what-worked.item: Phase 5 skill hotloading implemented cleanly with SkillLoader + SkillRegistry
Phase 6 calcification engine captures core thesis: Time × Usage × Ceremony × Consensus
Test isolation bug fix (property descriptor vs evaluated value) was good debugging
Adding `related` field to index enabled consensus scoring

what-didnt.item: Groq API 403'd - key expired or rate limited
Ollama worker output too generic without reef context - not useful for domain code
Worker trench pattern needs full Claude context, not lightweight LLMs

commits.commit: feat: Phase 5 - Skill infrastructure with hotloading
feat: Phase 6 - Calcification engine with organic growth mechanics

next-session.item: Test parallel Claude sessions in isolated worktrees
Fix Groq API key for worker dispatch
